attributes.additional_details: I am tired with the BBC coverage of the Scottish Referendum. I feel it is high time this is investigated. Their slanted, skewed, and downright biased coverage is ridiculous. They are a public service broadcaster owned by the public for the public, not by media moguls or governments. Their coverage has not been impartial, but instead coloured by the reporters and the corporation viewpoints.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC Trust.
